sys_ui_message.key: The filter defined on the table 'em_alert' is being executed on the table 'em_alert_history'. The filter fails because one of its fields does not exist in the table 'em_alert_history'.
sys_ui_message.message: Фільтр, визначений у таблиці em_alert, виконується за таблицею em_alert_history. Збій фільтра, оскільки одне з його полів немає у таблиці «em_alert_history».
sys_ui_message.sys_name: The filter defined on the table 'em_alert' is being executed on the table 'em_alert_history'. The filter fails because one of its fields does not exist in the table 'em_alert_history'.
